1.description: Type of event (e.g., INITMODEL, COLLISION, BIN_EVOL, etc.)

2.description: Unique encounter ID of each event

4.description: Time of the event in Myr

5.description: ID of the primary star involved in the interaction

6.description: ID of the companion star (if star was in a binary)

7.description: Updated ID of the companion star post-interaction

9.description: Mass of the primary before the event [Msun]

10.description: Mass of the primary after the event [Msun]

11.description: Mass of the companion after the event [Msun]

13.description: Semi-major axis before the interaction [Rsun]: value is O if star was single

14.description: Semi-major axis after the interaction [Rsun]: value is O if star was single

15.description: Eccentricity before the interaction : value is O if star was single

20.description: Mass of the first interacting object before the event [Msun]

21.description: Mass of the second interacting object before the event [Msun]

22.description: Semi-major axis of binary before the event [Rsun]

23.description: Stellar type of the first interacting object

24.description: Stellar type of the second interacting object

25.description: Mass of merged object (if applicable) [Msun] (mass of colliding object)

26.description: Stellar type of the merged object (stellar type of colliding object)

27.description: Mass of the companion before the interaction [Msun]
